mainEvent-1: It's time for the highlight of today's festivities... The Annual Spring Egg Hunt!$h
mainEvent-2: Calm down now, kiddos. You're all going to need your energy if you hope to find enough eggs and win the prize.
afterEggHunt-1: Wow, look at all these eggs!$h#$b#Now if only I could get you kids to pick up litter this efficiently, we'd have the cleanest town this side of the Gem Sea! *chuckle*$h
afterEggHunt-2: And now, the results of this year's egg hunt...
afterEggHunt-4: Well, that's it for this year's Egg Festival. Thanks for coming, everyone!
results-total: For a grand total of {0} eggs!
results-enough: Congratulations everyone, you've found enough eggs! Everyone gets a prize!$h
results-not-enough: I'm sorry to say, that's not enough eggs to win. Better luck next year!
